nodes.text: 1047 was a human male stormtrooper in the Desert Sands unit.
1047 was part of Zeta Squadron with Davin Felth when the unit was split three ways to search Mos Eisley for the missing droids that were carrying plans vital to the Rebellion.

When they were outside a cantina, 1047 and Felth were informed by a local merchant named Garouf Lafoe of a fight that went on during which Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi attacked and injured two thugs named Ponda Baba and Cornelius Evazan with his lightsaber. The pair thought there was nothing to be found in the cantina. When exiting, Zeta Squadron was attacked by Jawa Het Nkik wielding a blaster. When the pistol failed to fire, 1047 removed his own weapon from its holster and shot the Jawa dead, hesitating only to deride the Jawa's foolishness.
Soon after, he received the order to converge when the droids were sighted in nearby Docking Bay 94. His unit failed to prevent the launch of the freighter Millennium Falcon, carrying the droids.
